
                            
                            <p>用刚刚发的邮储数币30-10，89元6袋3斤，京东同款89元4袋 <br>  <br> 配料干净无淀粉，无杂肉 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/14/114426zi9hvqxhxxrgvhrg.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/14/114426zi9hvqxhxxrgvhrg.png"> <br> </p><p class="pl">本地60块钱左右一斤纯牛肉丸</p><p class="pl">我他妈直接买牛肉 30一斤不好吗</p><p></p>
